abstract: New technologies like Smart Power, and Power Integrated Circuits are the wave of the future in providing high performance low cost power conditioning subsystem (PCS)in small to large power applications.  This paper discusses circuit designs using these devices that are suitable for PCS in photovoltaic and other industrial applications such as electrical appliances, instrumentation, AC motor drives, battery chargers, automobiles, telecommunications, UPS, and switch mode power supplies.  It examines the cost of high volume production and current technological barriers asociated with the development of these technologies.
title: High Performance Low Cost Power Conditioning Subsystems Using Smart Power/ Power Integrated Circuits in Photovoltaic Power Systems
